content.prompt: While different theories exist about why no Christian art older than the earliest paintings from catacombs seems to have survived, some scholars theorize that early Christians

choices.label: avoided making religious images to distinguish themselves from members of other religions
had no time for image making since they were continually persecuted by Roman authorities
created religious art that was almost undistinguishable from other religious art of the time
only started making images once the literacy rate among the population began declining
